response:
Left RAPD with reduced acuity localises to the left optic nerve. Right-sided UMN signs in the leg (brisk knee/ankle, clonus, upgoing plantar) with segmental LMN signs in the right arm (hypotonia, absent supinator, reduced biceps) and impaired proprioception/Romberg indicate a right cervical hemicord lesion around C5 affecting dorsal columns and corticospinal tract with segmental involvement.

lesion_locations = ["left optic nerve", "right C5 spinal cord"]
